title: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.
snippet: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.

title: Chelsea’s Enzo Maresca high on Manchester City’s list in event of Pep Guardiola exit - The Athletic
snippet: Operating under Guardiola in 2022-23 preceded Maresca’s appointment by Leicester City and he immediately oversaw their promotion to the Premier League, only to then join Chelsea as Mauricio Pochettino’s replacement. They finished fourth in the top-flight and lifted the Conference League and expanded Club World Cup titles at the first attempt.

title: Enzo Maresca: Chelsea appoint Leicester City boss as new manager on five-year deal - BBC Sport
snippet: Chelsea have appointed Leicester manager Enzo Maresca as their new boss on a five-year contract with the option of an extra year.

title: Chelsea appoint Enzo Maresca as head coach
snippet: Italian signs five-year deal as he leaves Leicester City to replace Mauricio Pochettino at Stamford Bridge · Chelsea have announced the appointment of Enzo Maresca as their new head coach.

title: How and why Chelsea hired Enzo Maresca – and the seven things they were looking for - The Athletic
snippet: But Chelsea are wary that a shorter contract, like the one Pochettino received, will leave them vulnerable should another club register an interest. The possibility of Maresca being on champions Manchester City’s shortlist of potential successors if Guardiola leaves when his current deal expires at the end of next season is not being discounted. It says much about the faith the hierarchy place in their latest appointment that they have granted him permission to bring a quintet of backroom staff with him from Leicester, led by the former Chelsea goalkeeper Willy Caballero who will be Maresca’s assistant at Stamford Bridge.
